name: SALT AIR SERVICES PTY LIMITED
about: Salt Air Services Pty Limited is a premier provider of advanced flight training, crewing, and consulting services throughout Australasia. Established with a commitment to professional training, our team consists of highly experienced and trained professionals who teach using real-world techniques gained from years of industry experience. We offer a wide range of training services, including flight reviews, single and multi-engine training, general competency, and specialized courses such as floatplane, tailwheel, and gas turbine operations. With over 11 years of experience in C208 Caravan training and operations across Australia and Asia, Salt Air Services is dedicated to delivering high-quality training that meets the needs of both individuals and companies. Our instructors are passionate about aviation and ensure that every student receives comprehensive and practical training. Contact us for more details on how we can help you achieve your aviation goals.
services:
["C208 Caravan Training
Warbird Training
Floatplane Training
Contract Training & Checking"]
